content: single_crochet then chain 5 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in the next single_crochet * repeat from* to * across the row end with chain 3 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in last single_crochet end off headband row 1 with size f crochet hook chain 40 work 1 single_crochet in each chain end off finishing weave in all ends attach a button or tiny strips of velcro to back of dress sew on a ribbon rose or trim if desired 10/11 c connie j pritchett march 2019 set # 19 chelsea doll crochet dresses c connie j pritchett march 2019 11/11
